thread.section_title: Nutrisystem Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Nutrisystem | nutrisystem.com | 2 of 84
thread.title: Donna Pugh

author: Donna Pugh
title: Donna Pugh
text: Most of the shelf stable food dinners are terrible, particularly the boxed ones. The lunch bowls that require 50% power never get cooked and half still boils over. Most of the bars are good, but by far the frozen food is the better choices, although quite expensive. The best thing you can learn from nuttiestystem is portion size and how to cook your own food with fresh ingredients and no preservatives .
